member.summary: The class for calling the EventHub

member.name: M:EventHubProject.EventHub.Register(System.Object)
member.summary:
The method that registers the instance of the subscribing class for calling the subscribing methods.
Throws Exception when multiple subscribers in the same class has same DataType or Subscribers have zero or more than one parameters in their set.
member.param: The instance of the subscribing class

member.name: M:EventHubProject.EventHub.Deregister(System.Object)
member.summary: The method that deregisters the instance of the subscribed class
member.param: The instance of the subscribed class

member.summary: The method to post an event with a unique DataType

member.summary: The method to cancel further posting of an event
